history:
friend: I recently went on a trip with a woman I adore. The trip ended poorly, though, and things have not been the same since.
me: I hate to hear that, what happened that made it end poorly?
friend: We did not capitalize well on the short amount of time that we had togeth
me: Man, that sounds really tough. Sorry to hear that things didn't go as planned. Maybe we could talk about how we can avoid similar situations in the future? What are your thoughts on that?
friend: Yeah, I guess so...I don't know...Thanks for listening.
me: Of course, no problem. I totally understand. Well, maybe next time you can try to get to know her better before anything serious happens? That way you can avoid any misunderstandings or miscommunications. Just my two cents, though! surely there must be something else you can use to get her attention?

You can try using other signals, such as a gentle tap on the shoulder or a soft whisper in her ear. Alternatively, you could try making eye contact and smiling at her, which may help to grab her attention.

friend: Haha, yeah maybe! Thanks for understanding!
me: No problem, I know how that feels.
